Author: hunger_hunter
Text: Thanks. I’m planning to bring this up this week in therapy. I’ve been avoiding it too long- I guess I’m embarrassed that we talk about my ED but I can’t bring myself to believe it.

Author: Sleepy_Golden_Storm
Text: I've been a Wannarexic Butterfly™ for the better part of a decade and I still can't fully convince myself that maybe this is more than a ploy for sympathy that I'm choosing to engage in for funsies. I'm not sure that this is exactly what you're talking about, but I can definitely understand irrational ED mindsets that cling to you like ivy.  I know you said that you avoid talking about it, but maybe one day you can mention these thoughts to your therapist and begin to work through them outside of the echo chamber of your head. Other than that, all I can really say is that I feel you and I'm sorry that you're stuck dealing with this bullshit on top of 'regular' ED stuff.
